QuestData.Title: Where's Synge?
QuestData.Description: Hey, $n, you haven't seen our gunsmith, Synge, have you?$B$BI just know that the pirates captured him! He said that he was going to try to sell them some rifles, or something.$B$BWould you please look for him up at the Southsea Holdfast to the east? I'll bet that no-good gnome he's always traveling with, Wizzle Brassbolts, got him into trouble!
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Synge at the Southsea Holdfast in Thousand Needles.
QuestData.RewardText: Hey! Get me out of here!
